title: Poster, "Sigurd Lewerentz Arkitect", ca. 1988
provenance: Acquired new and directly from designers, museums, and cultural institutions by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: On grey ground: a black-and-white photograph of an older man in glasses lighting up a cigarette; he is in a room with canted ceiling, standing before a drafting table littered with photographs, papers, model of a building complex, and illuminated with a single lamp. Around this photographs appear blueprint plans for various structures. Inscriptions run vertically, in yellow- at upper left: "SIGURD LEWERENTZ ARKITEKT", and at lower right: "MUSEUM FUR GESTALTUNG ZURICH". Other inscriptions in small type appear at upper edge.
